Token.Abstract: The TICDSSynchronizationOperationDelegate protocol defines the methods implemented by delegates of TICDSSynchronizationOperation or one of its subclasses. In the TICoreDataSync framework, these delegate methods are implemented by the document sync manager.
Informs the delegate that the operation has been paused because of a conflict. The delegate should query its own delegate to ask how to resolve the conflict.

Parameter.Name: anOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The operation object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the operation has resumed after being told how to resolve the conflict.

Parameter.Name: anOperation
Parameter.Abstract: The operation object that sent the message.
